description: What is the internet doing to us? The Times tech columnist Kevin Roose discovers what happens when our lives move online.

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: It’s called “Hard Fork,” and it’s all about the wild frontiers of tech. With co-host Casey Newton. Listen to the trailer here, and check out the first episode wherever you get your podcasts, including on Apple, Spotify, Stitcher, Amazon and Google.

items.title: Kevin Has a New Podcast

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: One QAnon believer’s journey through faith and loss — and what becomes of reality as we move online.
items.content:encoded: One QAnon believer’s journey through faith and loss — and what becomes of reality as we move online.

items.title: Eight: 'We Go All'

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: QAnon believers, united in a battle against what they see as dark forces of the world, reveal where the internet is headed.
items.content:encoded: QAnon believers, united in a battle against what they see as dark forces of the world, reveal where the internet is headed.

items.title: Seven: 'Where We Go One'

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: An interview with PewDiePie, as he comes to grips with his influence.

items.title: Six: Impasse

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: How one outsider came to rule the internet — and eventually embody its battle with mainstream culture.
items.content:encoded: How one outsider came to rule the internet — and eventually embody its battle with mainstream culture.

items.title: Five: The Accidental Emperor

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: A trip to YouTube for a conversation with the woman trying to change it.

items.title: Four: Headquarters

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: Five years into a rabbit hole, Caleb goes from one side of the screen to the other.

items.title: Three: Mirror Image

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: “The truth is down there, and you’ve got to go down and dig for it.” We trace Caleb’s descent into YouTube, inch by inch.
items.content:encoded: “The truth is down there, and you’ve got to go down and dig for it.” We trace Caleb’s descent into YouTube, inch by inch.

items.title: Two: Looking Down

items.author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
items.content: A young man finds escape on the internet. He doesn’t realize that on the other side of the screen, a force is pulling him in.
